    • toSignOut

      public void toSignOut(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws IOException
      This method is an event handler on the "Sign Out" button. When clicked, the button redirects the program to the original Login Screen
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - Passed from the On Action event listener on the "Sign Out" button.
      Throws:
      IOException - Exception gets thrown if load() cannot locate the FXML file

    • onDeleteAppointment

      public void onDeleteAppointment(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws SQLException
      This method is an event handler on the "Delete Appointment" button. When clicked, the button prompts the user to confirm they wish to delete the selected appointment and once confirmed, the appointment is deleted from the database.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - Passed from the On Action event listener on the "Delete Appointment" button.
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • toCreateAppointment

      public void toCreateAppointment(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws IOException
      This method is an event handler on the "Create New Appointment" button. When clicked, the button redirects the program to the SalespersonCreateEditAppointmentScreen.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - Passed from the On Action event listener on the "Create New Appointment" button.
      Throws:
      IOException - Exception gets thrown if load() cannot locate the FXML file

    • toEditAppointment

      public void toEditAppointment(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws IOException
      This method is an event handler on the "Edit Appointment Button". When clicked, the button redirects the program to the SalespersonCreateEditAppointmentScreen.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - Passed from the On Action event listener on the Edit Appointment button.
      Throws:
      IOException - Exception gets thrown if load() cannot locate the FXML file

    • onDeleteClient

      public void onDeleteClient(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws SQLException
      This method is an event handler on the "Delete Client" button. When clicked, an alert will pop up asking the User to verify that they wish to delete the Client and all associated Appointments. Upon confirmation, the Client will be deleted from the database and the display table updated.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - Passed from the On Action event listener on the "Delete Client" button.
      Throws:
      SQLException - Exception gets thrown if the SQL code does not compute properly.

    • toCreateClient

      public void toCreateClient(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws IOException
      This method is an event handler on the "Create New Client" button. When clicked, the button redirects the program to the SalespersonCreateEditClientScreen.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - Passed from the On Action event listener on the "New Client" button.
      Throws:
      IOException - Exception gets thrown if load() cannot locate the FXML file

    • toEditClient

      public void toEditClient(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws IOException
      This method is an event handler on the Edit Client Info button. When clicked, the button redirects the program to the AddModifyCustomerScreen.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - Passed from the On Action event listener on the Edit Client Info button.
      Throws:
      IOException - Exception gets thrown if load() cannot locate the FXML file
